TopicTitle: [REQUEST] mod to have a button to swap craft back to a flying state from a landed state

Articles.Content: There seems to be a bug that puts your craft in a landed state while in orbit (getting rid of your predicted trajectory and maneuvers), a band-aid to undo this would be nice while we wait for the bugfix.

I created a mod here that should pull your ship out of the landed state automatically when it gets stuck https://spacedock.info/mod/3278/KerbalPatchProgram. I'll be uploading the source and creating a forum release soon. Let me know if this works for you if you try it.
